name: ROBOmonster
description:
ROBOmonster is a unique blend of two game genres - Action and RPG. Player can choose a random pickups to the liking, get experience to develop skills, earn pickups that contains weapons and health. All of this will be used against thousands of enemies. The monster fill the game screen, never letting you rest, even for a minute.

Imagine yourself coming to visit an unknown city and seeing it almost ruined, with all the citizens turned into dark world. What will you do? Call for help, organize a large-scale rescue campaign or... Try to dig your way out of the situation, find out what happened and use your last chance to save the person you love!

  • Player can shooter monsters with multiple weapons
  • Huge crowds of enemies, more monsters on one map at a time.
  • Ability to pickups weapons and health that upgrade the main character's parameters.
  • More than 4 weapon types, including more enemy damage with weapons.
  • Each weapon have unique abilities to shoot, some are fast and some are causing more damage to enemies.
  • Several types of enemies
  • Epic Boss fight, that spawn multiple different enemies at same time.
